snippet.title: The life of a porting house
snippet.description:
* The life of a porting house day as the PC, while the initial release of BioShock Infinite was five months late. "We aggressively try to be day and […] what Aspyr Media has been doing for roughly 17 years. They take a popular PC or console game - BioShock Infinite is the […] with the BioShock Infinite port, for instance - or they had to wait until the last minute for source code or publisher
15 weeks ago
